lines.text: The Go Wizard... his robes are kinda charred, right?
Yeah? Where you goin' with this?
Well... what if the wizard straight up held the guy in the fire?
Like, with his hands? Just grabbed him and held him in place so he could cook real good?
...Huh. You're sayin' the singed bits are from standin' right next to the fire as he grappled Slick?
Well... I don't know if that'd do it.
Would the old man really be strong enough to restrain Slick?
On top of that, the wizard got shot- and that probably happened before Slick burned to death.
There- there aren't any signs of burning on the wizard's hands, either, like you'd ex-expect.
Well, um, I guess we can go back to that if we can't think of anything else?
Sure, but I bet there was <c=#FF00FF>an easier way</c> to keep him from movin'.
